SqlVector.summary: Represents a vector value in SQL Server.

ctor1.summary: Takes a as input and represents a null vector value.

ctor2.summary: Takes an array of values as input and initializes a new instance of the SqlVector class.

Length.summary: Indicates the count of the elements in the vector.

Size.summary: Indicates the size in bytes for a SqlVector value.

Memory.summary: Returns the values as a instance.

ToArray.summary: Returns an array representing the vector values.

ToString.summary: Returns the string representation of a JSON array of the values.
